long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our project is a chrome extension that’s aiming to go against as many design principles as possible such as color, space, alignment, etc. It was inspired by The Masochist’s Teapot -a teapot with a handle below the spout that renders it useless- and will completely change the style and functionality of google chrome. These changes will be made using JavaScript and HTML to change the text size, text color, font, background color, borders, etc. in the hopes of creating “The Masochist’s Chrome Extension”.
